![](http://talk.lowendspirit.com/uploads/editor/pf/68bg1ftp0rrn.png "")

This is exactly what your web project/website will scream, once you finally treat her right, upgrade her from an old server and treat her with a fresh Nexus Bytes AMD Ryzen powered NVME VPS! You should treat her right because she is a princess! A prince of your project is a boy! If your VPS is Gender Fluid, It should be treated with royal treatment!


To Start q1 With a bang, this will be our only "MegaAMDPromo" for the whole q1 and these promos will expire on the 31st of January, 2020. To be clear, **this will be  our only Premium VPS promo for q1 of 2020.** Grab em now, regret later :lol: 

Plans starting as lows as:  $2.56/mo  (With annual payment for new members, even cheaper for existing!. If you are not part of the Family Yet, this is best the time! 

-----------------
**Order and configure here:**
**AMD Ryzen Powered VPS:** https://nexusbytes.com/cart.php?gid=16 (LA won't be provisioned till the 10th)

**For New Family Member:**
Discount Code: _**NEWYEARNEWME25**_ - 25% off with annual or semi-annual payment expires on 01/31/2020 (Nano plan not eligible for discount)

**For the Loyal Existing Family Members who supported our growth:**
Discount Code:  _**NEWYEARFAMILY30**_ - 30% off with annual or semi-annual payment 01/31/2020 (Nano plan not eligible for discount)

**Sweet-Switch Special**
[Contract Buy-Out And Switcher Special](https://nexusbytes.com/knowledgebase/31/Switcher-Special-and-Contract-Buy-Out-Guidline.html "Contract Buy-Out And Switcher Special")
-----------

>From $2.56/mo or less

There are more customizable plans available on our website! You get the best $ value when you order with annual payment.

----------------

**For the Loyal Existing Family Members who supported our growth:**

**Also, a quick disclaimer: Signup today,  or ya'll ain't getting this till next year.  Lalalalala**

On another very important news:


![](https://media2.giphy.com/media/unKDis9RhWSGs/giphy.gif "")

**With Chinese New Year Approaching, We are excited to announce our 3rd home! Los Angeles, California!!**
------


> Location (LA, CA, USA)
> Test IPv4: lgla.nexusbytes.com
> Test file: http://lgla.nexusbytes.com/1000mb.test.zip

Services from the new location will become available to the general public starting January the 15th.  

**Now I don't want you to wait!  We got some pre-order special located here, with some added hybrid fun ;)
https://nexusbytes.com/cart.php?gid=17**  from as low as $2.50/mo.

Please only select LA as the location. If you select another location, your order will be canceled. 
Pre-order will end on Jan 10th.
Approximate delivery time: From Jan 10th-Jan 15th. 

Additional 2nd storage can be purchased for $1/mo/100GB.

**Existing Family Members Gets An Additional 5% off with code:**
**_LAPREFAM5_-**  5% Annual or Semi-annual - Expires on 01/10/2020

**Powered by Ryzen 3900x and raid protected NVMe+HDD Combo**

-----------
**Quick FAQ:**
